程序包 com.academic_assistant.controller

类 PostController

java.lang.Object
com.academic_assistant.controller.PostController
@RestController public class PostController extends Object
PostController handles the HTTP requests related to posts, comments, and replies.

      @CrossOrigin @PostMapping("/post/submit") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> post(@RequestBody String postRequest)
      Submits a new post.
      参数:
      postRequest - the request containing the post details
      返回:
      a ResponseEntity indicating the result of the operation

      参数:
      postRequest - a JSON string representing the request details to fetch follow posts.
      返回:
      a ResponseEntity containing a JSON string of the follow posts data.
